text: On the thirteenth day of the twelfth month, the month of Adar,9:1 Adar is the twelfth month of the Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of February and March; also in verses 15, 17, 19, and 21. the kingâ€™s command and edict were to be executed.
